typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		STATE_NAME as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT\n  [STATE_NAME]\n  FROM [staging].[STAGING_01_DAILY_PRICING]',
	format: 'query') ~> sourcereadstatenames
source(output(
		STATE_ID as integer,
		STATE_NAME as string,
		DWH_CREATED_DATE as date,
		DWH_UPDATED_DATE as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> sourcedimstate
sourcereadstatenames keyGenerate(output(STATE_ID as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKeyForStateID
SurrogateKeyForStateID, sourcedimstate lookup(sourcereadstatenames@STATE_NAME == sourcedimstate@STATE_NAME,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupTargetDimensionTable
LookupTargetDimensionTable select(mapColumn(
		STATE_NAME = sourcereadstatenames@STATE_NAME,
		STATE_ID = SurrogateKeyForStateID@STATE_ID,
		TARGET_STATE_ID = sourcedimstate@STATE_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectMappedTargetColumns
SelectMappedTargetColumns alterRow(insertIf(isNull(TARGET_STATE_ID))) ~> AlterRowInsertNewStateNames
AlterRowInsertNewStateNames derive(PROCESSING_DATE = currentDate()) ~> DerivedColumnCreatedUpdatedTimestamp
DerivedColumnCreatedUpdatedTimestamp sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		STATE_ID as integer,
		STATE_NAME as string,
		DWH_CREATED_DATE as date,
		DWH_UPDATED_DATE as date
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		STATE_ID,
		STATE_NAME,
		DWH_CREATED_DATE = PROCESSING_DATE,
		DWH_UPDATED_DATE = PROCESSING_DATE
	)) ~> sinkDIMSTATE
